mapper.select: SELECT s.id as show_id ,s.img_route,s.title,s.start_date,s.end_date,s.adult_rate,s.youth_rate,s.infant_rate, count(case when t.age_group_id=1 then 1 end) as infantCount , count(case when t.age_group_id=2 then 1 end) as youthCount, count(case when t.age_group_id=3 then 1 end) as adultCount FROM show_tb AS s Join user_tb AS u ON u.id = s.organizer_id join show_datetime_tb AS sd ON sd.show_id = s.id left Join ticketing_tb AS t ON t.show_time_id = sd.id left JOIN age_group_tb AS a ON t.age_group_id = a.id where s.organizer_id = #{userId} group by s.id;

select * from show_tb as s join user_tb as u on u.id = s.organizer_id join show_datetime_tb as sd on sd.show_id = s.id join ticketing_tb as t on t.show_time_id = sd.id join age_group_tb as a on t.age_group_id = a.id where s.id = 1 and t.ticketing_date BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} and t.age_group_id = 3 and s.organizer_id = #{userId};
select * from user_tb as u join show_tb as s on u.id = s.organizer_id where s.title like #{title};
